text: Agek Lom bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep bɨawl anɨb ak agak, Bɨawl, yad bɨ tep mel, kal yad ak ownɨmɨn tek ma lup agak. Pen yad nepin, bɨawl yad ak, ne yɨb awl mɨdeb, yad nop muk okok mɨdebin agak. Yad pen, yɨb awl mɨdebin, bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep okok kɨli yɨp muk okok mɨdebal agak. Olap nop Amnoŋ agen, ne amub agak. Olap nop Owan agen, ne owup agak. Bɨ wog gɨñeb yad anop Anɨb ak gɨnɨmɨn agen, ne anɨb ak gup agak. Anɨb ak, suŋ laŋ agɨl takaw anep agenɨmɨn, bɨ wog gɨñeb yad tap gup anop suŋ lɨnɨgab agak.
